events.name: Pyrometallurgical Method
events.wd_description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.
events.description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.

events.name: Hydrometallurgical Method
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: Bioleaching Technique
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.

events.name: Sorting Starting Materials for Cells
events.wd_description: Combinations of pyrometallurgy and hydrometallurgy are also used due to their advantages in sorting starting materials for cells.
events.description: Combinations of pyrometallurgy and hydrometallurgy are also used due to their advantages in sorting starting materials for cells.

events.name: Use phase inclusion
events.description: Future studies should expand system boundaries to include the use phase as a source for material that must be recycled.

events.name: Recycling routes
events.wd_description: Different recycling routes, such as pyrometallurgical routes and their combinations, should be considered as different companies use different recycling methods.
events.description: Different recycling routes, such as pyrometallurgical routes and their combinations, should be considered as different companies use different recycling methods.

relations.wd_description: qualifies something (inception or end of a thing, event, or date) as happening previously to another thing
